node_info.name: theHiveProjectTrigger
node_info.description: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur

properties.displayName: You must set up the webhook in TheHive — instructions here
properties.name: notice

options.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Filter any incoming events based on their fields
properties.hint: The field to filter on, supports dot notation

values.name: field
values.hint: The field to filter on, supports dot notation

options.name: Equal
options.description: Field is equal to value

options.name: Not Equal
options.description: Field is not equal to value

options.name: Includes
options.description: Field includes value

properties.name: allCases
properties.description: Whether to search in all cases or only in a selected case

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Field is between two values ('From' is inclusive, 'To' is exclusive)

values.name: operator
values.description: Field is between two values ('From' is inclusive, 'To' is exclusive)

options.name: Between
options.description: Field is between two values ('From' is inclusive, 'To' is exclusive)

options.name: Contains
options.description: Field contains the substring from value

options.name: Ends With
options.description: Field ends with value

options.name: Equal
options.description: Field is equal to value

options.name: Greater Than
options.description: Field is greater than value

options.name: Greater Than Or Equal To
options.description: Field is greater than or equal to value

options.name: In
options.description: Field is one of the values

options.name: Less Than
options.description: Field is less than value

options.name: Less Than Or Equal To
options.description: Field is less than or equal to value

options.name: Match Word
options.description: Field contains the value as a word

options.name: Not Equal
options.description: Field is not equal to value

options.name: Starts With
options.description: Field starts with value

properties.name: attachmentId
properties.description: ID of the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.description: Whether to search in all tasks or only in selected task

properties.action: Add attachment to a task log
